nodes.text: The Vandronian government was a government operating within the Vandron system of the Mid Rim's D'Aelgoth sector at some point following the Battle of Endor of 4 ABY.
The Vandronian government was mentioned in the 1995 Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game supplement Heroes & Rogues, which was written by Paul Sudlow and Rick Stuart for West End Games.
